metadata.title: CVE-2018-14335 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in H2 1.4.197. Insecure handling of permissions inthe backup function allows attackers to read sensitive files (outside oftheir permissions) via a symlink to a fake database file.

criterions.comment: h2database: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
